meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hurried.
meanings.sent1: Her hurriedness to finish the project caused mistakes.
meanings.sent2: I could sense the hurriedness in her voice as she rushed to catch the bus.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's hurriedness to gather nuts before winter was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The hurriedness of the river flowing downstream mirrored my own sense of urgency.
meanings.sent5: The hurriedness of the chef in the kitchen made the whole restaurant buzz with energy.

meanings.sent1: The hurriedness of the students to leave the classroom at the bell was amusing.
meanings.sent2: His hurriedness to pack for the trip led to forgetting important items.
meanings.sent3: The cat's hurriedness to catch the laser pointer light provided entertainment for the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The hurriedness of the ants carrying food back to their nest was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The hurriedness of the shoppers during the holiday season created chaos in the store.
